chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
cn: nid
others: seq nid
pts: seq nid
Hnin: is_true (cn \notin pts)
Puniq: is_true (uniq pts)
ptag: ttag
prec: PStateT -> payload -> Prop
pn_prec_safe: forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : PStateT) (m : payload), HPn this to -> prec s m -> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := ptag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1
to: nid
this: nid
d: dstatelet
m: data

Goal:
pn_safe this to d m -> coh d

Premises:
Notation coh := TPCCoh
is_true = eq^~ true : bool -> Prop Arguments is_true _%bool_scope is_true is a coercion
tag = fun t : TaggedMessage => let (tag, _) := t in tag : TaggedMessage -> nat
HPn = fun this to : nat_eqType => this \in pts /\ to == cn : nat_eqType -> nat_eqType -> Prop
payload = seq nat : Set
ttag = nat : Set
Notation seq := list
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
PStateT = (nat * PState)%type : Set
content : forall mtype : Type, msg mtype -> mtype
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
uniq : seq ?T -> bool where ?T : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts ptag : ttag prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop pn_prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : PStateT) (m : payload), HPn this to -> prec s m -> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := ptag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1 this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : data |- eqType]
tms_cont = fun t : TaggedMessage => let (_, tms_cont) := t in tms_cont : TaggedMessage -> seq nat tms_cont is a coercion
from : forall mtype : Type, msg mtype -> nat
pn_safe = fun (this n : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : data) => HPn this n /\ (exists (Hp : HPn this n) (C : coh d), prec (getStP C (pn_this_in Hp)) msg) : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> data -> Prop
active : forall mtype : Type, msg mtype -> bool
nat_eqType = EqType nat nat_eqMixin : eqType
data = seq nid : Set
cohMsg = fun (ms : msg TaggedMessage) (y : nat) => if from ms == cn then to ms \in pts /\ msgFromCoordinator (content ms) y else if from ms \in pts then to ms == cn /\ msgFromParticipant (content ms) y else True : msg TaggedMessage -> nat -> Prop Arguments cohMsg _ _%nat_scope
nid = nat : Set
find_some : find ?k ?f = Some ?v -> ?k \in dom ?f where ?K : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts ptag : ttag prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop pn_prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : PStateT) (m : payload), HPn this to -> prec s m ->...-> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := ptag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1 this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : data |- UMC.sort ?U]
find_none : find ?k ?f = None -> ?k \notin dom ?f where ?K : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts ptag : ttag prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop pn_prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : PStateT) (m : payload), HPn this to -> prec s m ->...-> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := ptag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1 this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : data |- UMC.sort ?U]
UMC.Exports.pts : ?K -> ?V -> ?cT where ?K : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts ptag : ttag prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop pn_prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : PStateT) (m : payload), HPn this to -> prec s m ->...-> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := ptag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1 this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : data |- union_map_class ?K ?V]
eqP : reflect (?x = ?y) (?x == ?y) where ?T : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts ptag : ttag prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop pn_prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : PStateT) (m : payload), HPn this to -> prec s m ->...-> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := ptag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1 this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : data |- Equality.sort ?T]
map : (?T1 -> ?T2) -> seq ?T1 -> seq ?T2 where ?T1 : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts ptag : ttag prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop pn_prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : PStateT) (m : payload), HPn this to -> prec s m ->...-> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := ptag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1 this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : data |- Type]
Mem : ?pT -> Mem_Pred ?T where ?T : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts ptag : ttag prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop pn_prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : PStateT) (m : payload), HPn this to -> prec s m -> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := ptag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1 this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : data |- Type] ?pT : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts ptag : ttag prec : PStateT ->...-> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := ptag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1 this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : data |- PredType ?T]
mem : ?pT -> mem_pred ?T where ?T : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts ptag : ttag prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop pn_prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : PStateT) (m : payload), HPn this to -> prec s m -> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := ptag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1 this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : data |- Type] ?pT : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts ptag : ttag prec : PStateT -> payload ->...-> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := ptag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1 this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : data |- predType ?T]
Protocols.rcv_tags : seq (receive_trans ?coh) -> seq nat where ?nodes : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts ptag : ttag prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop pn_prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : PStateT) (m : payload), HPn this to -> prec s m -> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := ptag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1 this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : data |- dstatelet ->...-> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := ptag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1 this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : data |- cohpred ?nodes]
Protocols.snd_tags : seq (send_trans ?coh) -> seq nat where ?nodes : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts ptag : ttag prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop pn_prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : PStateT) (m : payload), HPn this to -> prec s m -> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := ptag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1 this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : data |- dstatelet ->...-> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := ptag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1 this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : data |- cohpred ?nodes]
dyn_tp : {x : ?A & ?P x} -> ?A where ?A : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts ptag : ttag prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop pn_prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : PStateT) (m : payload), HPn this to -> prec s m -> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := ptag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1 this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : data |- Type] ?P : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts ptag : ttag prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop pn_prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : PStateT) (m : payload), HPn this to -> prec s m ->...-> Type]
dyn_val : forall x : {x : ?A & ?P x}, ?P (projT1 x) where ?A : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts ptag : ttag prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop pn_prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : PStateT) (m : payload), HPn this to -> prec s m -> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := ptag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1 this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : data |- Type] ?P : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts ptag : ttag prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop pn_prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : PStateT) (m : payload), HPn this to -> prec s m ->...-> Type]
cn_send_trans : forall (stag : ttag) (prec : CStateT -> nid -> payload -> Prop), (forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : CStateT) (m : payload), HCn this to -> prec s to m -> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := stag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1) -> Transitions.send_trans coh
valid : ?cT -> bool where ?cT : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts ptag : ttag prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop pn_prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : PStateT) (m : payload), HPn this to -> prec s m -> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := ptag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1 this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : data |- pcm]
Unit : ?cT where ?cT : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts ptag : ttag prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop pn_prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : PStateT) (m : payload), HPn this to -> prec s m -> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := ptag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1 this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : data |- pcm]
PCM.join : ?cT -> ?cT -> ?cT where ?cT : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts ptag : ttag prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop pn_prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : PStateT) (m : payload), HPn this to -> prec s m -> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := ptag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1 this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : data |- pcm]
head : ?T -> seq ?T -> ?T where ?T : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts ptag : ttag prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop pn_prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : PStateT) (m : payload), HPn this to -> prec s m -> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := ptag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1 this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : data |- Type]
behead : seq ?T -> seq ?T where ?T : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts ptag : ttag prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop pn_prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : PStateT) (m : payload), HPn this to -> prec s m -> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := ptag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1 this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : data |- Type]
perm_eq : seq ?T -> seq ?T -> bool where ?T : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts ptag : ttag prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop pn_prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : PStateT) (m : payload), HPn this to -> prec s m -> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := ptag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1 this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : data |- eqType]
rcons : seq ?T -> ?T -> seq ?T where ?T : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts ptag : ttag prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop pn_prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : PStateT) (m : payload), HPn this to -> prec s m -> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := ptag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1 this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : data |- Type]
cn_step_coh : forall (stag : ttag) (prec : CStateT -> nid -> payload -> Prop), (forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : CStateT) (m : payload), HCn this to -> prec s to m -> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := stag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1) -> s_step_coh_t coh stag (cn_step (prec:=prec))
eq_op : rel ?T where ?T : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts ptag : ttag prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop pn_prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : PStateT) (m : payload), HPn this to -> prec s m -> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := ptag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1 this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : data |- eqType]
in_mem : ?T -> mem_pred ?T -> bool where ?T : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts ptag : ttag prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop pn_prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : PStateT) (m : payload), HPn this to -> prec s m -> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := ptag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1 this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : data |- Type]
cat : seq ?T -> seq ?T -> seq ?T where ?T : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts ptag : ttag prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop pn_prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : PStateT) (m : payload), HPn this to -> prec s m -> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := ptag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1 this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : data |- Type]
all : pred ?T -> seq ?T -> bool where ?T : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts ptag : ttag prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop pn_prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : PStateT) (m : payload), HPn this to -> prec s m -> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := ptag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1 this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : data |- Type]
has : pred ?T -> seq ?T -> bool where ?T : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts ptag : ttag prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop pn_prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : PStateT) (m : payload), HPn this to -> prec s m -> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := ptag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1 this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : data |- Type]
cn_send_prep_trans_obligation_1 : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : CStateT) (m : payload), HCn this to -> send_prep_prec s to m -> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := prep_req; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1
cn_send_abort_trans_obligation_1 : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : CStateT) (m : payload), HCn this to -> send_abort_prec s to m -> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := abort_req; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1
cn_send_commit_trans_obligation_1 : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : CStateT) (m : payload), HCn this to -> send_commit_prec s to m -> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := commit_req; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1
pred_of_seq : seq_eqclass ?T -> {pred ?T} where ?T : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts ptag : ttag prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop pn_prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : PStateT) (m : payload), HPn this to -> prec s m -> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := ptag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1 this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : data |- eqType]
ssrbool.SimplPred : pred ?T -> simpl_pred ?T where ?T : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts ptag : ttag prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop pn_prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : PStateT) (m : payload), HPn this to -> prec s m -> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := ptag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1 this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : data |- Type]
eq_mem : mem_pred ?T -> mem_pred ?T -> Prop where ?T : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts ptag : ttag prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop pn_prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : PStateT) (m : payload), HPn this to -> prec s m -> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := ptag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1 this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : data |- Type]
mkLocal : ?T * Log -> union_map_classPCM heapUMC where ?T : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts ptag : ttag prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop pn_prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : PStateT) (m : payload), HPn this to -> prec s m -> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := ptag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1 this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : data |- Type]
cast : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A B : ?C), A = B -> interp B -> interp A where ?C : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts ptag : ttag prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop pn_prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : PStateT) (m : payload), HPn this to -> prec s m -> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := ptag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1 this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : data |- Type]
dyn : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A : ?C), interp A -> {x : ?C & interp x} where ?C : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts ptag : ttag prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop pn_prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : PStateT) (m : payload), HPn this to -> prec s m -> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := ptag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1 this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : data |- Type]
rely_consume_other : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (s s' : state) (m : mid) (tm : TaggedMessage) (from : nat), network_rely w this s s' -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := from; to := this; active := true |} -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s' l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := from; to := this; active := true |}
step_consume_other : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (s s' : state) (m : mid) (tm : TaggedMessage) (from : nat) (z : nat_eqType), this != z -> network_step w z s s' -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := from; to := this; active := true |} -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s' l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := from; to := this; active := true |}
SendMsg : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 -> forall S : send_safe st this to (getStatelet s1 l) msg, all_hooks_fire w l (t_snd st) s1 this msg to -> Some b = send_step S -> s2 = upd l {| dstate := upd this b (dstate (getStatelet s1 l)); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) {| content := {| tag := t_snd st; tms_cont := msg |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} s1 -> network_step w this s1 s2
network_step_ind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : Prop), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P
network_step_sind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : SProp), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P
cn_safe_coh : forall (prec : CStateT -> nid -> payload -> Prop) (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : data), cn_safe prec this to d m -> coh d

original: simpl. intros. intro Hsafe. apply Hsafe.
